English: WARNING: Biosignatures detected leaving <color=orange> [sys_purge] </color>zone, Caution Is adviced..
Description: Don't localize [sys_purge]. A text that appears on screen to warn the players that an automated system has detected a "biosignature" (meaning an unknown creature/monster) on the loose.

French.Translation: AVERTISSEMENT : biosignatures détectées en provenance de la zone <color=orange>[sys_purge]</color>. Soyez prudent.

Italian.Translation: ATTENZIONE: tracce biologiche in uscita dalla zona <color=orange>[sys_purge]</color>. Si consiglia cautela.

German.Translation: WARNUNG: Biosignaturen beim Verlassen der <color=orange>[sys_purge]</color>-Zone entdeckt. Es wird zur Vorsicht geraten.

Spanish.Translation: ADVERTENCIA: Bioseñales detectadas al salir de la zona <color=orange>[sys_purge]</color>. Cuidado.

Russian.Translation: ВНИМАНИЕ! Биосигнатуры покинули зону <color=orange>[sys_purge]</color>. Действуйте осторожно.

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation: AVISO: Bioassinaturas detectadas deixando a zona <color=orange> [sys_purge] </color>; Aconselha-se cautela..

Polish.Translation: OSTRZEŻENIE: Wykryto biosygnatury opuszczające strefę <color=orange> [sys_purge] </color>, należy zachować ostrożność..

Japanese.Translation: 警告： <color=orange> [sys_purge] </color>ゾーン退出中に生体反応を検出。注意せよ..

Korean.Translation: 경고: 탐지된 생체 신호가 <color=orange> [sys_purge] </color>구역에서 이탈 중. 주의 요망..

Chinese_Traditional.Translation: 警告：偵測到生物標識離開<color=orange>[sys_purge]</color>區域，建議小心……

Chinese_Simplified.Translation: 警告：检测到生物特征离开<color=orange>[sys_purge]</color>区，请保持谨慎。

name: WardenObjectiveSpecial.Command_WaveWarning_Apex
